General.Name: Hanla IMS Co. Ltd
General.Industry: Machinery, Tools, Heavy Vehicles, Trains & Ships
General.Description: Hanla IMS Co., Ltd. provides integrated systems for shipbuilding and offshore plants, onshore plants, and green industries in South Korea and internationally. The company's Instrument division offers level instrumentations, cargo tank measuring systems, tank remote sounding systems, and loading computer systems. Its Environment division offers ballast water management systems under the Hanla Eco Guardian name. The company's LED division provides LED lighting products, lamps, modules, and displays. Hanla IMS Co., Ltd. was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Busan, South Korea.
